title: 计分板报错如何解决

replies.author: Czy2019
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-716670-1-1.html
建议更换更加优秀的计分板插件

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
删除或更新 worldguard

看上去是和 worldguard 联动的问题

replies.author: 吃土的紫轩
replies.txt_content: 建议更换计分板， miaoboard https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... =%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A
强烈推荐计分板支持动态 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-768 ... cetag=s_pcqq_aiomsg
